channel.title: Riot Gear (project)
channel.description: [IMG]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad12/cole1497/Wires2.png[/img][IMG]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad12/cole1497/Wires.png[/img][IMG]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad12/cole1497/SWATsideview.png[/img][IMG]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad12/cole1497/material-Copy.png[/img] Currently making riot gear. Will try and make the helmet with facemask, boots, etc. Currently fitted for 317, will release when finished. Oh, and its not triangulated.

item.title: Riot Gear (project)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:13, topic:373466”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=469480.msg3432634#msg3432634 date=1292478100]
Lucky the picture I had of myn was hosting on a site that shut down. I had made one of these a while back with a stick. Anyways, the entire shield should not be clear, otherwise it just makes it look like one heavy chunk of glass. The center is normally black, and is there to hold the shape of the glass/plastic.
[/quote]

There are wayy more sites than just tinypic lool xD[/quote]
I didn’t use tinypic? I had a website i made on 000webhost a while back before i knew how shitty they were. I installed a nulled script onto the site to look at it, took it off after about 20 minutes. Next day, my account was deleted. Shall we continue with false assumptions we have no educated hypothesis for?

Read full topic

item.title: Riot Gear (project)

item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

CoonHunter:

Lucky the picture I had of myn was hosting on a site that shut down. I had made one of these a while back with a stick. Anyways, the entire shield should not be clear, otherwise it just makes it look like one heavy chunk of glass. The center is normally black, and is there to hold the shape of the glass/plastic.

There are wayy more sites than just tinypic lool xD

item.title: Riot Gear (project)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Lucky the picture I had of myn was hosting on a site that shut down. I had made one of these a while back with a stick. Anyways, the entire shield should not be clear, otherwise it just makes it look like one heavy chunk of glass. The center is normally black, and is there to hold the shape of the glass/plastic.

item.title: Riot Gear (project)
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Your way was a bit more difficult to make the text cohesive with the shield, but it worked great once I rotated it to fit. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Riot Gear (project)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:9, topic:373466”]@The Wanderer I see what you did there…
I just added my way, which looks a bit different, but I can ctrl+z and try this. Should I use the magnet tool to pull them for a more even model?

@h1 Exactly, perfect for me :p[/quote]
I just selected the opposite cuts and moved them at the same time. Then I selected the middle cut and moved it. Made it more like a exponential curve than a constant one.

Read full topic

item.title: Riot Gear (project)
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

@The Wanderer I see what you did there…
I just added my way, which looks a bit different, but I can ctrl+z and try this. Should I use the magnet tool to pull them for a more even model?

@h1 Exactly, perfect for me

item.title: Riot Gear (project)
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

the wanderer:

Oh god not these again.

I hadn’t seen a single o.O I thought it was skillcapes, partyhats, etc.

the wanderer:

Also just add 3 more loop cuts into the shield.

wat

Read full topic

item.title: Riot Gear (project)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Oh god not these again. People have made like 100 riot shields. First police baton I’ve seen though. Good luck on your little project. Also just add 3 more loop cuts into the shield. That will give you the most curve you will need.

Read full topic

item.title: Riot Gear (project)
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

deans1243:

This is kinda cool, can you make the shield curve like it does in mw2?

I watched as my brother was playing it yesterday, and thought of that. Of course, it would have to be a higher poly. I think it would be worth it though.

Read full topic
